name: Volcano Fire Fury
description:
Enjoy the Power of the earth as lava erupts to the surface on these volcanic islands in this one of a kind simulation!

Watch as huge fountains of magma, rock and lava light up the night and spew from the volcanic crater as toxic smoke and hot gas fill the sky! You control the power and force of this deadly miracle and wonder of nature!

Huge fireballs rain down as hot fast pyroclastic flows run down the mountain side!
